title.rendered: Air Europa Reservation Office in Miranda, Uruguay

content.rendered:
Updated on 21/07/17


Air Europa Lineas Aereas, S.A.U. is an airline in Spain, the third largest after Iberia and Vueling. The airline is headquartered in the Polígono Son Noguera in the Centro Empresarial Globalia in Llucmajor, Majorca, Spain.The airline is 100% owned by Globalia, a travel and tourism company managed by Juan José Hidalgo. Since September 2007 the airline has been a member of the SkyTeam alliance.
Air Europa Miranda Uruguay Address:
Hector Miranda 2442

Phone:
Reservations & Bookings: 2716 6666

Fax: (00598) 29028004

Working hours
Map: View direction here

Air Europa Official website: https://www.aireuropa.com/en/flights

Air Europa Online Check-in: www.aireuropa.com/en/flights/online check-in

Note: Online Check in begins 24 hours before departure, and up until 90 minutes before your flight’s scheduled departure time.

Air Europa Check-in timing www.aireuropa.com/en/flights/check-in timing

Check Air Europa flight schedule here: www.aireuropa.com/en/flights#/schedules-routes

Check Air Europa flight status here: www.aireuropa.com/en/flights/flight-status

INFORMATION, SALES AND POST SALES:

Telephone: (+ 34) 911 401 501
Office hours: Service 24hrs.

WEB CLIENT SERVICE:

Telephone: (+ 34) 911 360 080
Business Hours: From 7am till midnight Monday to Sunday.

BAGAGGE SERVICE DELAY / LOSS OR DAMAGE:

Telephone: (+ 34) 911 360 190
Business Hours: From 8.00am to 00.00pm all days.
Fax: +34 971 57 55 27
Address

Post Box 132
07620 – Llucmajor (Baleares)
Spain

Fax: +34 971 178 439

Post Box 132
07620 – Llucmajor (Baleares)
Spain

SUMA CLIENT SERVICE

Telephone: +34 911 360 200
Business Hours: Monday to friday from 09:00 to 17:00hrs

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Europa (Airlines)

Total fleet: 53

  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A330-300
  • ATR 72-200
  • ATR 72-500
  • Boeing 737-800
  • Boeing 737 MAX 8
  • Boeing 787-8
  • Boeing 787-9
  • Embraer ERJ-145
  • Embraer 195

Queries handled by Air Europa Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Suma (formerly Flying Blue and Fidelitas)
